name: Jungle Protector
description:
Jungle Protector is a 2D Platformer game where you play Kong King. Kong King is a gorilla blessed by the forest whose purpose is to defend it from its enemies. 

The forest called Kong to defend it from an invasion of lumberjacks zombies. 

You will have to defeat your enemies in order to protect the sacred tree. 

This game has been made in a week (4 days) during a Game Jam organised by l'Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia. The imposed theme of this Game Jam is "Nature".

The assets used in this game are part of the "DevGameRPG" pack.

I (Matthieu Manuellan) worked alone on this project.

Jungle Protector lasts approximately 5 minutes. It contains a tutorial and a quick gameplay phase. More content will be added soon ...

/!\ IMPORTANT /!\

THE GAME HAS TO BE PLAYED USING XBOX ONE CONTROLLER

/!\ IMPORTANT /!\
